posts.post_content:
Nr mint condition came from the complete booklet out of the Christies New York Auction for $40+K with juice. This is Dummy Hoy's most rare card. Investment quality piece and very unique as Dummy is on very few cards and is in The 1898-99 Copper Plate Set but NOT in the 1899 M101-1 set. $8000  will post a scan when received as it is in transit to me. Feel free to call with any questions. Thx, Jim 614 562 2421  

Sorry for fuzzy scan it's to big for my scanner

posts.post_title: I bought with others I just wanted Hoy
posts.post_content: Wagner and Hoy are the best ones IMO Steve Verkman has many forsale on his website from the group including the Wagner ROOKIE
